timeline.message:
Consume archives in file import jobs

Fixes: OX-6341

Fixes XSD validation on XML import jobs

The main job provides a builder which is then filled with entries by the target factory.

Value is collected from the context using the parameter name

Fixes: OX-6341

Fixes XSD validation on XML export jobs

The main job provides a builder which is then set visible or not depending if xsds were provided by the calling factory.

Value is collected from the context using the parameter name

Fixes: OX-6341

timeline.message:
Refactors the parameter creation for XML jobs

the import job provides a static method to initialize a new parameter

the export job handles it internally as the parameter is rendered based on provided XSD paths

Fixes: OX-6341

Adds the ability to perform several passes over an xml file

registerHandlers provides the pass current being performed. Also it expects now a consumer instead of providing the raw XMLreader

Uses a list of registered handler consumers instead of passes

Different code, same effect but more Javaish...
